entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times mixed with ice pellets and freezing drizzle. Fog patches. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times mixed with ice pellets and freezing drizzle. Fog patches. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow overnight. Amount 10 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Tuesday 17 January 2023
